mapper.select: SELECT reception_id, p.patient_id, patient_name, front_registration_number, back_registration_number, systolic, diastolic, blood_sugar, height, weight, bmi FROM Patient p INNER JOIN Reception r ON p.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE reception_id = #{reception_id}
SELECT drug_code, drug_name FROM Drug_Taking dt INNER JOIN Drug d ON dt.drug_id = d.drug_id WHERE patient_id = #{patient_id};
SELECT disease_code, disease_name FROM Underlying u INNER JOIN Disease d ON u.disease_id = d.disease_id WHERE patient_id = #{patient_id};

SELECT d.drug_code, d.drug_name FROM Drug_Taking dt INNER JOIN Drug d ON dt.drug_id = d.drug_id INNER JOIN Patient p ON p.patient_id = dt.patient_id INNER JOIN Reception r ON dt.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.reception_id = #{reception_id};

SELECT d.disease_code, d.disease_name FROM Disease d INNER JOIN Underlying u ON d.disease_code = u.disease_code INNER JOIN Patient p ON p.patient_id = u.patient_id INNER JOIN Reception r ON u.patient_id = r.patient_id WHERE r.reception_id = #{reception_id};
